definition: (of a circuit breaker or switch) to trip
to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate
gear/brake/sluice/lock (on waterway)/electric switch or circuit breaker

sentences.english: Sometimes I would fall down just by tripping.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，我會塌下來了剛剛由跳閘。

sentences.english: A principle of preventing chain over-load trip based on wide-area information is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 文中提出了基於廣域信息的防連鎖過載跳閘保護原理。

sentences.english: Under normal circumstances, line fault reclosing after tripping sooner, the better.
sentences.chinese: 一般情況下，線路故障跳閘後重合閘越快，效果越好。

sentences.english: The total lightning outage rate is closer to the the practical running result.
sentences.chinese: 計人感應雷擊計算的總跳閘次數更接近實際運行值。

sentences.english: It deployed equipment that automatically reports power cuts.
sentences.chinese: 公司安裝了能夠自動報告電路跳閘事故的設備。

sentences.english: Moreover, suggestions for the prevention from trips caused by bushfire are also listed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 並對今後預防輸電線路山火跳閘工作提出了改進意見。

sentences.english: Could you check the switch is trip or not. Alright?
sentences.chinese: 請您檢查一下開關，是否跳閘。好嗎？

sentences.english: Electrification state has the anti-theft indication; opening door without permission will cause the system to trip.
sentences.chinese: 通電情況具有防盜指示，私自開門後造成跳閘。

sentences.english: Optimize Design of Iron Tower, Lighten Load of Pole or Tower, Reduce Flash-over Rate of Transmission Lines.
sentences.chinese: 優化鐵塔設計，減輕杆塔荷載，降低線路跳閘事故。

sentences.english: Tripping is used in the Praying Mantis Kung Fu style to catch an opponent off guard.
sentences.chinese: 跳閘是用在螳螂拳功夫風格來捕捉對手猝不及防。

sentences.english: In a two-terminal configuration when a terminal is tripped out, the active power is no longer interchanged.
sentences.chinese: 在一個雙口配置中，當一端跳閘時有功功率不再交換。
